Review Text: Bought for my son a few months ago and they have been working perfectly. Came with a charger and they charge pretty fast and charge actually lasts. Very easy to use and Bluetooth connection was easy. Audio is clear and microphone is good too. Has  volume control. Great value for the money!

Ich habe mir dieses Gaming-Headset im Frühjahr gekauft, lange getestet und bin mehr als zufrieden! Es überzeugt auf ganzer Linie:1. Robustheit: Das Headset fühlt sich extrem hochwertig an. Selbst bei intensivem Gebrauch bleibt es stabil und zeigt keine Abnutzungserscheinungen. Es wirkt so, als würde es problemlos jahrelang halten.2. Ton- und Mikrofonqualität: Die Soundqualität ist fantastisch! Klare Höhen, tiefe Bässe und eine hervorragende Raumklang-Wiedergabe – perfekt, um in Spielewelten einzutauchen. Auch das Mikrofon liefert glasklare Sprachqualität, was meine Mitspieler sofort bemerkt haben. Ideal für Team-Kommunikation.3. Lieferung: Die Lieferung war blitzschnell. Innerhalb von 24 Stunden war das Headset bei mir, gut verpackt und ohne jegliche Beschädigungen.4. Optik: Das Design des Headsets ist modern und absolut ansprechend. Es sieht nicht nur toll aus, sondern fühlt sich durch die angenehmen Materialien auch hochwertig an.Insgesamt ist dieses Headset jeden Cent wert. Ich kann es uneingeschränkt jedem Gamer empfehlen, der Wert auf Qualität, Komfort und ein schickes Design legt. 5 von 5 Sternen!

Review Title: Qu’il ne faut pas hésité mdr
Review Text: “Excellent rapport qualité/prix ! Ce casque gaming est vraiment impressionnant pour le prix. Le son est clair et immersif, avec des basses bien présentes qui renforcent l’expérience de jeu. Le micro capte bien la voix, ce qui est parfait pour les parties en ligne. Confortable même après plusieurs heures d’utilisation, il est léger et les coussinets sont doux. La qualité de fabrication est surprenante, avec une finition solide malgré son prix abordable. Si vous cherchez un bon casque gaming sans vous ruiner, c’est un choix sûr !”

I needed a new headset seeing my previous headset broke down.  I looked at various headsets on the market and came across this beauty.  The headset was good value for money. The fact the headset supports Bluetooth and Wireless is awesome.  This meant I could use the headset via Bluetooth on my gaming laptop and use wireless when playing on the PS4.The headset is nice and comfy.  My ears fit in the headset fine and cause no pain which smaller headsets have done for me in the past.  The LED lights on the ear parts just make it look really cool and give it a nice premium finish.  The way the microphone works as well has been well thought out seeing you can move it out the way and it folds neatly into an opening on the left head ear piece.  As stated, you get a lot of bang for your money being dual Bluetooth and Wireless.  The headset also has noise cancelling technology for the microphone so even in a loud room you can still be heard.The battery life of the headset seems to be very good. I easily got many hours use out of the headset between charges. It quickly charges via the USB-C cable that comes with it.  Would I recommend the headset? Yes definitely. It has lots of features which more expensive headsets have but at a much better price.  The headset also got delivered nice and fast due to being able to order it through Amazon Prime.

Review Title: These are awesome for Nintendo switch
Review Text: The headphones were shipped quickly! Packaging was  pleasant and came with the cord needed to charge. They are very comfy and the RBG lighting on them makes them look really cool. Considering what I paid for these I actually prefer them to more expensive headsets I have purchased in the past due to their duel functionality. I can put dongle right in my Nintendo switch dock when I’m playing on my monitor. When I want to play handheld the attachment on the dongle that goes directly into switch for portable use is AWESOME! They sound very clear and the mic seems to work well. I have asked about my voice quality with friends I game with and they said I sound super clear! I would buy again and I think I’m actually going to order a second pair for my kid! Super easy to set up. Super easy to connect!
